text: @JoeBiden I'll shock was Ida find out 120 million people died from covid-19 .  @JoeBiden the bodies are stacked to the sky. It's a good thing FEMA having all those coffins that they won't tell  us why they have them lined up in fields it was for the 120.000000 people that died
